name: booker-mini-ecommerce
description: Mini e-commerce de libros - Orquestador del proyecto completo

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'No lint script in backend'
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/.next node_modules
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.seed:all: cd backend && npm run seed:genres && npm run seed:books
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && npm run build && npm run start
